lines.text: Fresh air. The only cure for the ailing wife of the old carpenter.
At the shop, the new foreman weeds out the old hands.
Impossible to obtain employment at his age. Later his savings exhausted, starvation promises to be their lot.
A desperate attempt to obtain food. Arrested nearby, in night court, his true story a familiar tale.

[after the old carpenter's wife starves to death]
Nothing for the useful citizen wounded in the battle of life.
